titles.title: The Spirit Of The Lord Is Moving In This Place

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Spirit of the Lord
Is moving in this place;
He is touching every heart
And shining on each face;
He is setting captives free,
Making blinded eyes to see,
And I know He's blessing me!
The Spirit of the Lord
Is moving in this place.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
Hear the angels shout "Glory"
As they tell the wondrous story
How He gave His life for me;
Now there's no sin a-hidin'
Cause I'm in the vine a-bidin'
Jesus gives the victory.
